translations: 好捣乱的；好搞派系的；源于派别的

sentences.sentence: These meetings ought not to be sanctuaries for factious and flagitious fellows.
sentences.translation: 这些聚会不应成为帮派斗殴和凶残的人的庇护所。

sentences.sentence: Many of the old Puritan colonist retain their factious temperament in the new world.
sentences.translation: 许多清教徒开拓者在新大陆仍保持他们好争论的脾气。
